testcase.name: AppiumTest

error.message: The local appium server has not been started Reason: Timed out waiting for [http://127.0.0.1:4723/status] to be available after 20008 ms Consider increasing the server startup timeout value (currently 20000ms) Node.js executable path: /usr/local/bin/node Arguments: [/usr/local/lib/node_modules/appium/build/lib/main.js, --port, 4723, --address, 127.0.0.1] Output: [35m[Appium][39m [31m'npm' executable is not found neither in the process working folder (/Users/abdulsajeedmohammed/eclipse-workspace/Appium) nor in any folders specified in the PATH environment variable (/usr/bin:/bin:/usr/sbin:/sbin)[39m
